column4: when installing from a non-live cd, does it just install or is there something else i have to do? sorry for noob question if it is, im still rather new to linux

the "install cd" (doesn't matter if it is the live cd, alternative of minimal one) installs the OS. You will be asked questions along the way of partitioning and networking options etc.  what is the problem exactly?
all the images will install but while the live-cd has a graphical installer the alternative cd is text based. the server image is text-based + options specifically for servers + different kernel.
